author: mcconnell
msg: Not required (subsidiary projects now link to ../../project.xml).

author: crafterm
msg: Fix compilation of FTPSource with getUserInfo now removed

author: crafterm
msg: Fix NPE thrown if no source parameters are passed through
to the Factory and HTTPClientSource implementation.

author: mcconnell
msg: Moving the avalon.meta tags suite closer to the ATMAGS proposal.
1. replacement of the <type>:<version> syntax with an explicit type="<a-type>" version="<a-version>" style
2. updates to XML type readers and writers to handle the seperated format (while maintaining backward compatibility)
3. updates to tag handers to support declaration under the new format

author: mcconnell
msg: Updating the top-level build to include merlin-extensions.
